import { useState, useContext } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { AppContext } from '../../context/context' import localforage from 'localforage' import { useAuth } from '../../context/auth' import { HiOutlineTrash, HiOutlinePlusCircle, HiOutlineHeart } from 'react-icons/hi' import SearchBar from '../SearchBar/SearchBar' import css from './NavBar.module.css' import ImgLogo from '../../assets/img/logo.png' export default NavBar => { const auth = useAuth() const { addRandomCharacter, loading, clearAll } = useContext(AppContext) const logout = () => auth.logout() return (
{auth.user && (
)}
